headline: How Investors May Respond To Bio-Techne (TECH) Doubling Down On Multi-Omic Integration Under New Leadership
summary: Earlier in 2026, Bio-Techne highlighted its leadership in spatial biology and proteomic analysis under new CEO Kim Kelderman, emphasizing automated diagnostic platforms and multi-omic integration, while also scheduling a February 4, 2026 conference call to review second-quarter fiscal 2026 results.
